text: The Warji (B.2 West Chadic) languages are a branch of West Chadic languages. They are spoken in the Bauchi State of Nigeria. ==Languages== The Warji languages are:Blench, Roger. 2006. The Afro-Asiatic Languages: Classification and Reference List (ms) *Pa'a *Warji *Diri *Ciwogai *Kariya (Vinahə) *Mburku *Miya *Siri *Zumbun (Jimbin) *Ajawa (†) ==References== Category:West Chadic languages Category:Languages of Nigeria
title: Warji languages
